rows.label: qst104903_msg0001
rows.name:
*gasp* You would come to me
with your radiant warmth and
gorgeous Flowers of Ice...?

rows.label: qst104903_msg0002
rows.name:
Wait... I feel as if I'm on the
verge of a breakthrough...

rows.label: qst104903_msg0003
rows.name:
Give me a moment... The ideas
are coming to me now...

rows.label: qst104903_msg0004
rows.name:
I would love to reward you, but please
bear with me. I'm on the cusp!

rows.label: qst104903_msg0005
rows.name:
...No! How could I even
consider making one of Alst's
treasures work for free!

rows.label: qst104903_msg0006
rows.name:
I have a room over at Anastatia's
in Teos Aure. Could you pay
me a visit there later?

rows.label: qst104903_msg0101
rows.name:
You've returned with the
flowers I asked for?

rows.label: qst104903_msg0102
rows.name:
But they're such beautiful flowers... I
would really prefer to receive them from
a similarly handsome gentleman...
